en.title: **Frontend** Developer
en.text:
Built production-grade admin dashboards and enterprise frontend systems for international clients.

  • AnonymousHealth.com (USA) - Implemented patient intake flows, analytics, AI companion interfaces, scheduling pipelines, and role-based admin UI
  • Integrated AI-driven CBT workflows, intake automation, appointment pipeline automation, and clinician support tools
  • Contributed to achieving: 40% higher conversions, 80% lower intake costs, 50% fewer appointment no-shows
  • InstaCircle Admin Dashboard & Mobile App - Built comprehensive community management platform using Next.js + Tailwind CSS and React Native
  • • Increased member engagement by 35% through intuitive UI/UX design
  • • Reduced event management time by 60% with automated workflows
  • • Improved fundraising efficiency by 45% with streamlined donation processes
  • • Enhanced job posting visibility by 50% with advanced filtering system
  • • Boosted daily active users by 40% with seamless mobile experience
  • • Increased event attendance by 55% through push notifications and reminders

en.title: **Frontend** Developer
en.text:
Built responsive, SEO-optimized web apps using React.js and SCSS, boosting engagement by 25%.

  • Collaborated with UX teams to implement user-friendly interfaces
  • Optimized performance and implemented responsive design patterns
  • Enhanced user experience through modern frontend technologies

en.title: **Web** Developer
en.text:
Created responsive, accessible interfaces with optimized performance, improving usability by 30%.

  • Reduced page load times through performance optimization
  • Adhered to SEO best practices and accessibility standards
  • Implemented modern web development techniques

en.title: **Web Development** Course Instructor
en.text:
Taught HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js to over 50 students, focusing on best practices for modern web development.

  • Created detailed tutorials on responsive design and accessibility
  • Improved students' proficiency by 40% through hands-on teaching
  • Developed comprehensive curriculum for web development fundamentals
